[File: aptos-core/crates/aptos-crypto/src/hkdf.rs] [Function: extract()] [Seed storage security] If seeds (ikm) are persisted to disk for validator restart scenarios, are they properly encrypted, or can disk access reveal master seeds compromising all derived keys? (High)

[File: aptos-core/crates/aptos-crypto/src/hkdf.rs] [Function: expand()] [Derived key persistence] When derived keys are stored in AptosDB or other storage layers, are they properly protected with encryption-at-rest, or can storage compromise reveal all validator or account keys? (High)

[File: aptos-core/crates/aptos-crypto/src/hkdf.rs] [Function: extract()] [Backup contamination] If validator backups include seeds or PRKs, can compromised backup systems enable offline attacks to derive all validator keys without accessing live systems? (High)
